segments.text: How can she just stand there ignoring the flood?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's soaking the cabinets and floor like it's nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's too busy with that stupid plate to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, climbing on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're stealing cookies right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy could crash down any minute, and she'll be to blame.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's encouraging this nonsense with her outstretched hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is infuriatingly irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a perfect garden, but inside it's a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone turning off the faucet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're letting this happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is huge now, slippery and dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to snap out of it!
segments.speaker: PAR
